title: Coronavirus: Tasmania to shut two hospitals, staff forced to quarantine
description: Tasmania will shut two hospitals amid coronavirus outbreak, forcing 1000 people into quarantine
content: Tasmania will close and deep clean two hospitals at the centre of a coronavirus outbreak in the states northwest.The North West Regional Hospital and North West Private Hospital in Burnie will close from 7am on Monday, it was announced by Premier Peter Gutwei… [+1468 chars]
